results.description: Uses EPS momentum as short-term alpha. Applied SUGGESTION1 by using EPS and time-series operators; SUGGESTION3 applied (coverage 0.5) via ts_backfill(eps,252). SUGGESTION4 applied because eps has high userCount/alphaCount. Kept KEEP_IN_MINDs: implementation short, uses <=2 datafields and <=7 operators. Confidence set to 0.72 because earnings momentum historically predictive but subject to seasonality and reporting noise.

Capture growth in sales vs one year ago. SUGGESTION1 used sales and ts_delta; SUGGESTION3 applied with ts_backfill(sales,252) due to 0.5 coverage. SUGGESTION4 applied: sales has high counts. Respect KEEP_IN_MINDs. Confidence 0.68: solid fundamental growth signal but slower to trade.

Return on assets improvement: use return_assets and assets. Applied SUGGESTION1 (two fields). Because both have coverage 0.5, applied ts_backfill to both. SUGGESTION4: return_assets and assets have good userCounts. Kept implementation concise (<=2 fields, <=7 operators). Confidence 0.7 due to profitability persistence.

Detect firms with rising operating profitability: ebit relative to sales trending up. SUGGESTION1 used ebit and sales. SUGGESTION3 applied via ts_backfill for both. SUGGESTION4 applied: ebit/sales are high-use fields. Kept under operator limits. Confidence 0.69.
Prior 12-month EPS acceleration as predictor. SUGGESTION1 used eps and ts_delta; SUGGESTION3 used ts_backfill(eps,252). SUGGESTION4 applied. Implementation compact. Confidence 0.66.

Use cashflow_invst (investing cash flow) and capex to detect improving free cash generation. SUGGESTION1 used cashflow_invst and fnd6_newa1v1300_capx. SUGGESTION3 applied to both via ts_backfill. SUGGESTION4: cashflow_invst has decent counts. Kept concise. Confidence 0.64.

Quarterly shares repurchased (total) scaled by shares outstanding indicates buyback intensity. SUGGESTION1 used fnd6_newqv1300_cshopq and fnd6_mfma1_csho; both backfilled per SUGGESTION3. SUGGESTION4 partially applied. Respect lengths. Confidence 0.60.

Use difference between earnings (eps) and operating cash proxies to detect accruals. SUGGESTION1 used eps and cashflow_invst. Applied ts_backfill to both (SUGGESTION3). SUGGESTION4 applied for eps. Kept <=2 fields/operators. Confidence 0.63.

R&D as fraction of sales (innovation/growth). SUGGESTION1 used fnd6_rds and sales; both ts_backfill applied (SUGGESTION3). SUGGESTION4: sales high userCount. Implementation concise. Confidence 0.58 (R&D signals long-term).

Rising inventory_turnover indicates operational improvement. SUGGESTION1 uses inventory_turnover only; since it's single field, ts_backfill applied per SUGGESTION3. SUGGESTION4 applied (high counts). KEEP_IN_MINDs satisfied. Confidence 0.62.

Use bookvalue_ps as value metric; apply cross-sectional zscore. SUGGESTION1 used single field bookvalue_ps; SUGGESTION3 used ts_backfill(bookvalue_ps,252) due to coverage. SUGGESTION4 applied (bookvalue_ps high userCount). Kept simple. Confidence 0.55.
EBITDA scaled by sales and cross-sectionally ranked. SUGGESTION1 used ebitda and sales; both backfilled (SUGGESTION3). SUGGESTION4 applied. Implementation short. Confidence 0.67.

Detect falling debt in current liabilities relative to assets. SUGGESTION1 used debt_st and assets; ts_backfill applied to both per SUGGESTION3. SUGGESTION4 applied: debt_st high userCount. KEEP_IN_MINDs confirmed. Confidence 0.59.

Working capital changes signal operational cash flow improvements. Used working_capital single field with ts_backfill (SUGGESTION3). SUGGESTION4: working_capital decent count. Implementation concise. Confidence 0.61.

ROIC improvement using ebit and invested_capital. SUGGESTION1 used ebit and invested_capital; applied ts_backfill to both (SUGGESTION3). SUGGESTION4 high for invested_capital. Kept concise. Confidence 0.7.

Approximate FCF using cashflow_invst minus capex over market proxy (use assets as proxy scale). SUGGESTION1 used cashflow_invst, fnd6_newa1v1300_capx and assets (2 fields max allowed -> cashflow_invst and fnd6_newa1v1300_capx used; assets avoided). Applied ts_backfill to both (SUGGESTION3). Confidence 0.65.
Use sales_ps growing vs 4 quarters ago. Applied ts_backfill(sales_ps,252) per SUGGESTION3. SUGGESTION4 applied (sales_ps decent counts). Kept concise. Confidence 0.6.

Compare eps to retained_earnings change to detect accruals. SUGGESTION1 uses eps and retained_earnings; both backfilled. SUGGESTION4 applied for eps/retained_earnings. KEEP_IN_MINDs honored. Confidence 0.62.
